mapper.insert: insert into member(id, password, nick, addr, phone, email, name, birth) values(#{id},#{password},#{nick}, #{addr}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{name},#{birth})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where id=#{id};
select * from member where id=#{id} and password=#{password};
select id from member where name=#{name} and phone=#{phone} and birth=#{birth}
select password from member where id=#{id} and phone=#{phone}
